Special Collections
The University of Virginia Library 12766-b

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of W. Ralph Singleton
1940-1980
did.physdesc: This collection consists of 20500 items (13 linear feet).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of W. Ralph Singleton, Accession #12766-b, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Mrs. Ralph Singleton 1981 Oct. 14.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Papers of W. Ralph Singleton as Miller Professor of Biology and Director of the Blandy Experimental Farm. Also includes papers regarding his work with the Brookhaven National Laboratory and other scientific organizations particularly re his specialty radiation genetics. Biographical data also included and correspondences regarding Accokeek Foundation National Colonial Farm, and his speeches and writings.
